title: Famous Fantastic Classics 01 [1974]
description: Famous Fantastic Classics was a short-lived series of trade paperback anthologies of science fiction and fantasy stories which had originally been published in pulp magazines. Only two books (both anonymously edited by Robert E. Weinberg) were issued - the first appeared in 1974 and the second in 1975. Famous Fantastic Classics #01 ed. Anon. (by Robert E. Weinberg) (West Linn, OR: FAX Collector's Editions, 1974, 128pp, tp) Facsimile reproductions from the original magazines. Cover artwork by Stephen Fabian. 3 · Introduction · Anon. · in 6 · Tomorrow · Arthur Leo Zagat · nv Argosy May 27, 1939 33 · The Man In The Moon · Homer Eon Flint · ss All-Story Weekly October 4, 1919 51 · The Snow Girl · Ray Cummings · n. Argosy November 2, 1929 (+3) 118 · Creatures Of The Ray · James L. Aton · ss Argosy All-Story Weekly October 10, 1925
